snippet: LEAD: The Democratic Party today approved the rules under which it will pick its 1992 Presidential candidate, and did so with a speed and civility that was almost breathtaking to party leaders who lived through the fierce squabbles of the last two...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: The Democratic Party today approved the rules under which it will pick its 1992 Presidential candidate, and did so with a speed and civility that was almost breathtaking to party leaders who lived through the fierce squabbles of the last two decades.

headline.main: Democrats Approve Rules To Allow Earlier Primaries

byline.original: By MICHAEL ORESKES, Special to The New York Times
